column3: ~This has developed into a bit of a follow-up on #13425. @achow101 would you take a look?~

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#13360](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/13360.html) ([Policy] Reject SIGHASH_SINGLE with output

This has 3 utACKs, 1 current.

2 conflicting PRs:
#14079: no ACKs
#13360: 1 concept ACK
I would prefer to keep `SignatureData` independent from the data being signed.
